body.name: Canon TS202 Inkjet Photo Printer, Black

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 11 hrs 52 mins
features: Fine hybrid ink system for detailed documents and photos.In The Box : PIXMA TS202 Inkjet Printer, Setup CD-ROM, Full Set of Ink Cartridges (PG-243/CL-244), Power Cord
Quickly refill paper with the dedicated rear paper tray
With a great compact size, the Pixma TS202 fits almost anywhere

OS compatibility: Windows 5 Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 7 SP1; Mac 6 Mac OS X v10.10.5, macOS v10.12 (Sierra); Ink compatibility: Ink tank & fill volume PGI 246 black: 8.9 ml (Std.) , 12.0 ml (XL), CLI 246 color: 9.0 ml (Std.) , 13.0 ml (XL), PGI 243 black: 5.6 ml (Std.), CLI 244 color 6.2 ml (Std.)
Output tray capacity - Rear paper tray 60 sheets of plain paper or 20 sheets of 4 x 6 / 10 sheets of 5 x 7 photo paper
body.description: Meet the Canon Pixma TS202 your simple printing solution. With a rear paper tray and a fine hybrid ink system, the Pixma TS202 is a great, compact printing solution for all your documents. The Pixma TS202 is also compatible with XL ink cartridges which can help save you money, print more when you need to, and extend the time between replacement sending ink cartridges.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Canon TS202 Inkjet Photo Printer Simple Affordable Printing Meet the PIXMA TS202 Inkjet Printer - your simple printing solution. With a Rear Paper Tray and a Fine Hybrid Ink System, the PIXMA TS202 is a great compact printing solution for all your documents. The PIXMA TS202 is also compatible with XL ink cartridges - which can help save you money, print more when you need to, and extend the time between replacing ink cartridges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does have to be hard wired! But great printer!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this printer for work all I needed was a simple, cheap, and black and white printer! This one is perfect the only thing it didn’t come with was the cord to connect it to your computer. If you need a simple cheap printer I HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to set up, simple to use, as good as it gets!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this more straightforward printer when the fancy one I bought before couldn't be made to work without fussing with it and calling customer support each time I had to print. This printer was easy to set up -- my computer didn't recognize it, but running the setup file on the DVD provided did the trick in about 5 minutes. After that there was a slight problem because the USB cable wasn't provided with the printer, but I bought one and it worked immediately once connected up. Nothing fancy, it doesn't fax, scan, or connect using Wi-Fi, but it's inexpensive and physically compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My Epson c88+ was finally rendered obsolete and so I was forced to look for a new printer. But everything I looked at was an all-in-one, which I don't need. I happened upon this Canon TS202 and thought I'd try it, in spite of the mixed reviews. That was a mistake. The first one I ordered worked fine until the return window lapsed, then I got the 10 blinking lights for no apparent reason. The printer had not been moved or touched other than to turn it on and to refill paper. The 10 lights was code for "needs professional service". REALLY?!?To throw good money after bad, I decided to purchase another one but also get the Asurion warranty. Well, now that printer is giving me those 10 lights. I submitted the claim with Asurion, but was informed that the printer is still under the manufacturer warranty and so I was to check with them about it. Yeah, right. I just hung up after being on hold for 21 minutes. I have pressing things I have to do, which included printing for a class I'm teaching tomorrow! I'm so livid. What happened to quality products?!? If you decide to purchase this printer, you are knowingly selecting a ticking time bomb. It's not "if" it will stop working, but "when".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a nice little printer, simple to operate.
reviews.reviewText: The first TS202 I bought for only $40 worked and then after a few weeks or so, it turned on but it didn't print. I called Amazon. They told me to trash it and they would send another one. I have it now and it is fine. Just one thing: I have been using it for less than a week from the time it arrived; however, a message showed up on my desktop screen today that the "Ink is running low." I spent an hour on the phone with a very pleasant woman convincing her that I shouldn't have to pay for a $16 ink (black only) replacement as the description of the printer says it comes with a "Full Set of Ink Cartridges." She agreed with me. I paid for a new black cartridge for $16 and she emailed a certificate for another black ink for free! BTW. I don't print pics; I just wanted the printer for my articles. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget and User Friendly Printer
reviews.reviewText: Budget friendly and easy to setup and use printer. This printer is not wireless and requires a USB printer cable. I like that the printer is dual voltage and prints in either color and black. It was just what I needed while working abroad with my laptop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's functional, but you do get one you pay for so dont expect anything facny
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this essentially because it was the cheapest option and we really only needed it for a small amount of things, A few business cards, some resumes and similar mostly text only content, Of course it'd be hard to really screw those things up and the included ink while very little was good enough for about 100 pages or so before it waned about "low ink". Of course the color cart is a 3 in one, mening if any one color runs out you need to replace all 3, so wastefull, not to mention the age old practice of mixing in color even on black and white printouts just to ensure the user requires more ink sooner, but since a new ink cart alone is only $10 less than the actual printer I'd strongly advice against getting this for any sort of long term use. Laser printers WTF.Since the ink carts are defective by design, and only lasted me about 100 pages, I decided to return them for a replacement rather than just tossing them. Thanks to Amazons wonderful return policy i had a replacement wihtin a week at non cost, just had to ship them back the old defective ones... Hopefully the ones they send wont have the same issue, but worst case I'll just keep returning them when they run out and save up for a proper laser printer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as a claims
reviews.reviewText: I have tried everything with my old printer to get it to work, but nothing was succeeding. I finally had to give up and start looking for a new printer, but I was worried about cost. This model absolutely is what it’s promised. It’s a very basic, but very efficient model That prints very well. It’s also nice that it only requires two ink cartridges as opposed to the four I have been using with my previous one. It’s not anything mine blowing but if you just want a good working printer this is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this now!
reviews.reviewText: I refuse to deal with another wireless printer. This printer is so easy to set up and use. Remember that tax season is coming up. Also if you have kids in school, it's a convience. Buy this. Very affordable. Those people that put less than 5 stars for this is because they they didn't pay attention that this DOES NOT come with a printer cable. It's only $8 on Amazon. BUY A PRINTER CABLE YO
When I ordered the printer it didn’t say the USB cord was not included ,l would of ordered it at the same time if I knew that.Very misleading in that aspect.
Es una impresora básica. No copia, no escanea y no tiene entrada para usb, ipad ni iPhone. Intente con adaptador y no pude. Solo funciona con cable desde computadora. Imprime muy bien.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can only print on one size photo paper
reviews.reviewText: This printer is easy to set up.The print quality is excellent.My problem with this printer is that it can only print on 4x6 photo paper. This is not clearly indicated in the product description. I needed to print up to 8x11.Unfortunately, I had to send it back.To be fair this is not a bad printer, just limited in the photo printing capability.
Didn't come with a USB cord so I have to buy one now. Doesn't set up to wifi.
